评论详情: I have mixed feelings about this shirt, I thought it was going to be kind of tan based on the photo, it’s white! The fit is great but the smell is freaking terrible. It smells like incense you have to wash it before you wear it because of the smell

The material is really cheap, and the shirt is see through unless you wear a skin colored bra. The print on the shirt feels more plastic then regular graphic tee's. it's more something id wear for aesthetic rather then comfort. Although The shirt fits good.
Not my favorite. It was short and kinda had a weird shape.
My daughter loved the shirt. It is more cropped than it appears in the photos. So, go a size up if you don’t want that look.
Product is as pictured and very cute. The material is nice and soft as well.
I bought this item for my daughter for back to school. Looks nice with baggy jeans. Fits true to size.
okay like i love this bro
I am a 38 C and usually wear a Medium to Large in shirts. This shirt was definitely snug in the chest area, and the decal was one of those rubbery prints.

shirt is generic and is fine - does have a weird odour though. as for the cherries, they look plastic compared to the fabric. it looks bad. from afar its cute and up close its cute as long as you dont focus too hard.
The quality of this shirt is just not what I expected. It will be a good lake shirt.
The print is fine and the fit is good. Overall it’s ok. Feels flimsy and “cheap”.

评论概述: Still cute, but nothing like picture
评论详情: Appears thin & fitting in pictures, but the actual product is tshirt material & the cherries are completely different.
its a good size and super cute, the cherries are kinda obviously a sticker vinyl thing, but that didnt bother me much. I like it a lot.

This t-shirt is Cute & comfy - good for everyday layering or by itself.  I love that it is double lined in the front - great for full coverage and I don't have to worry what color bra I wear.  It washed great with no shrinking, warping or loss of softness.

For the price, this is a great find – the length of the T-shirt is perfect not too short or too long. Only complaint however, is that the cherries are ironed on, so I’m not sure how well it will withstand the washer.

评论概述: Tshirt is white, not cream, but otherwise very cute
评论详情: I was hoping this tshirt was more of a cream white, than bright white. Only because i want to wear it to events (concerts, etc.) and I know I'll get stains on it quickly.  Otherwise, it is a very cute shirt! Soft and fits as expected.
The material is on the thinner side but I love the design and the cropped top.

This Y2K Graphic T Crop Top instantly elevates the retro chic aesthetic that is still on point, merging 2000s nostalgia with modern-day trendiness. Its updated fabric and fit make it not just comfortable but also a flattering choice. The vibrant graphic design adds a unique vintage flair, making it a versatile piece that pairs effortlessly with jeans, skirts, or shorts. I might be playing into the nostalgia a bit much here, but Y2K is quickly becoming one of my favorite brands because I have literally never been disappointed! And I love that all of my old faves are being introduced to a new crowd, who get to appreciate all of that 90s/00s awesomeness.

I sized up yet the shirt still flattens my chest and it’s definitely not flattering. Also the crop is at an odd length that’s like nearly a shirt but definitely cropped at the bottom. I will say that is better than the crop tops that are essentially a bandeau. It’s fine if that’s what you want out of a crop top but it’s nice to have more length if you’re still looking for a shirt. If you have a flatter chest it could be a nonissue for you. B cup and smaller are probably a fine fit. The design on the shirt is a plastic sort of decal on the tshirt. The sleeves aren’t uncomfortably tight for the arms. The neck hole isn’t too small either. It seems to be the no-effort sort of fashion that’s been big with skinny people who don’t have to try very much to look acceptable in what they wear. This isn’t something I see myself wearing for both comfort and styling reasons.
My daughter loves this shirt

I was very excited for this to come since it seemed like a cute design and I waited around 3 weeks before it came. When it arrived I thought they got my order wrong. The shirt is not small at all and is definitely not a baby tee. The shirt is very stretchy and the cherries on the shirt feel like plastic. The shirt is also very very thing and the color of my cherries and shirt look a lot different than in the photos. The shirt is a bright white along with the cherries being bright light red, not like the dark red the photos have. So disappointed. This shirt seems like it would have only cost 3 bucks to make. Do not buy
